summary: A mod that adds hunter traps in the form of Bear Traps to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/12709-1-1331657310.jpg[/img]

A mod that adds hunter traps in the form of Bear Traps to the game.

The player is able to pick up the traps, put them in his/her inventory and place them whereever he/she sees fit.
The player may also craft these traps at a forge.

The traps comes in different shapes; iron, steel, dwarven metal, orcish steel and ebony, each dealing a different amount of damage.

"Hunter Traps - For all your sneak-thief needs!"

Hunter Traps has been featured in a Skyrim mods video:
[youtube]aaXLBMZRnV8[/youtube] [youtube]e1YWr47R4Y4[/youtube]
author: Phrosen

files.name: Hunter Traps v1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Added poison traps
Added a message box that asks the player if he/she wants to reset or pick up the trap.
Added a way to choose between auto picking up traps/messagebox. -Click on a trap in your inventory for more information.
Added a couple of scripts
Improved a few scripts

files.name: Hunter Traps v1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Added a quest for poison traps
Implemented skeever claws
